data.eml:eml: Studies on Pakistan Lizards: Cyrtopodion baturense (Khan and Baig 1992) and Cyrtopodion walli (Ingoldby 1922) (Sauria: Gekkonidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Auffenberg, Kurt, Krysko, Kenneth L., Rehman, Hafizur (2010): Studies on Pakistan Lizards: Cyrtopodion baturense (Khan and Baig 1992) and Cyrtopodion walli (Ingoldby 1922) (Sauria: Gekkonidae). Zootaxa 2636: 1-20, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.198442
